11.content: what changes first? *I decide to have her boots get 3 4 or 5" heels no platforms and your used to the chest weight and heels no wobbling*
11.title: Mew Ichigo

112.content: you start to get younger all the way to 13, your arms hands and feet get small and femine. a cat tail grows from behind you, your hair to your neck and turns pink and cat ear's grow from your head. your face and voice changes when you speak it comes out femine, your waist shrinks and your butt and hips expand. your chest grows too........
112.title: whole body

choices: one piece of clothing at a time
1122.content: two B cups bloom from your chest Ichigo's regular chest size, you're now Ichigo in your clothing. you look cute as a catgirl, what changes next?
1122.title: B cups

choices: do funny pose's in the mirror
11221.content: a ribbon appear's on your tail, pink shoulder cuffs appear's. a pink thigh cuff appears, ur shoes became Red knee high boots with 5" heels. red wrist length gloves appears, and finaly ur shirt &pants became a pink strapless dress that kept ur chest from moving. ur 100% Ichigo now, http://www.cosplayhouse.com/images/D/Tok... you decide too........
11221.title: All clothing

11222.content: Now that you finished physically, you are not surprised when you see a red ribbon tie itself onto your tail, with a shiny gold jingle bell attached to it. Next,,,
11222.title: First comes the tail bell...

choices: ...try and see if you have Mew Ichigo's powers.
11223.content:
Expecting further changes, you stand in front of your mirror. However, except for your clothes re-sizing to fit your new body, after two hours, nothing else happened. "Guess it's over." you say, gasping at your girly voice, sounding just like Ichigo. Standing around as the iconic shojo magical girl dressed in your clothes, you wonder what your next plan of action should be.

You...
11223.title: Nothing

info.brief_description: you start to turn into a mew mew
info.description: same with the previous female morph's, main character is Jack 16. i'm allowed to make any changes for the mew mew's you can only if in a chapter i say so, rule's the same
